original_text: That is why the Lord removed them from their land. He was very angry with them. So he threw them out to a foreign country. We see that they are still there today.’
korean_text: 여호와께서 또 진노와 격분과 크게 통한하심으로 그들을 이 땅에서 뽑아내사 다른 나라에 내던지심이 오늘과 같다 하리라

sentences.original_text: That is why the Lord removed them
He was very angry with them
We see that they are still there today
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그들이 오늘날까지 여전히 거기 있는 것을 봅니다
